attributes.action: Change the car window tint law for front side windows to 50% instead of 70%
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The law states that motorcycle helmets have to allow 50% of light through, while front side windows for cars have to allow 70%. I believe the law should be changed to the same as motorcyles to 50%. The benefit of this is privacy from theft and it also makes your car look good. Some states in America have laws to allow as little as 5% through front sides. I believe it should be much lower than 70% here.
